script_line.statement: import com.workpoint.common.util.TableID;[lf]import com.workpoint.common.data.JobNodeData;[lf][lf]TableID nodeID = ThisJobTransitionData.sourceJobNodeID;[lf]JobNodeData node = ThisJobData.getNodeByID(nodeID);[lf]int nodeIt = node.nodeIteration;[lf][lf]System.out.println(nodeID);[lf][lf]if (nodeIt < 10) {[lf] return true;[lf]}[lf]else {[lf] return false;[lf]}
